symptoms.name: Muscle weakness
symptoms.severity: Variable, can range from mild to severe enough to cause paralysis
symptoms.pattern: Often begins in the hands and legs

symptoms.name: Tingling and burning sensations
symptoms.pattern: Can affect various parts of the body

symptoms.name: Numbness
symptoms.pattern: Can affect various parts of the body

symptoms.name: Chronic pain
symptoms.pattern: Can be associated with optic neuritis, trigeminal neuralgia, limb spasms

symptoms.name: Vision problems
symptoms.severity: Variable, can range from blurred vision to temporary blindness
symptoms.pattern: Can include blurred or grayed vision, temporary blindness in one eye, loss of normal color vision, issues with depth perception, or loss of vision in parts of the visual field. Nystagmus, opsoclonus, and double vision can also occur.

symptoms.name: Difficulty with bladder control
symptoms.pattern: Can range from urgency to incontinence

physical_findings: Optic neuritis (inflammation of the optic nerve)

imaging_findings.MRI: Characteristic lesions (plaques) in the brain and spinal cord
